item.title: Resume Keyword Analyzer
item.description: Resume Keyword Analyzer #### Video Demo: <URL HERE> #### Description: A Python application that determines the ratio of keywords from a job description compared to a user's resume text file Overview The goal of this project was to enhance familiarity with Python and explore a couple of Python libraries through the development of a practical application. Resume Keyword AnalyzerÂ is designed to help users optimize their resumes for specific job descriptions.
